channel.title: Magic Interface Display Runes
channel.description:
I've been trying to figure this out for quite awhile, How the hell do I remove the runes from the magic interface?
Example;
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2mo2idk.jpg[/img]
It's really bugging me. I'm sure other people would like to know also.
Thanks.
~Jayden

item.title: Magic Interface Display Runes
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If i remember right, frame 246 deals with manipulation of items on interfaces. So look for that, and instead of 556, 558, and 560, replace them with -1.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

I’m pretty sure it’s in one of the classes thatwho ever the guy was, on adding ALL the lunar spells, it’s somewhere in there, cbb to pull up the link… its under client hacking though
